#summary Getting started

= Getting Started =

== Checkout Source ==

   * Checkout source for this project. See http://code.google.com/p/pdf-pub-tools/source/checkout

== Build Tools ==

   * Import pdf-pub-tools project into Eclipse IDE as an existing Java project.
   * Build project.

== Usage ==

   * Start Open Office in "headless" mode
   * Run Book Publisher GUI or CLI using Eclipse IDE launchers.

Note: The Book Publisher tool requires Open Office to be running in "headless" mode to perform the document to PDF conversion.

See [Usage]
